channel.title: Client.jav
channel.description: in client i jav i type server = then there is 2 things that come up, what do i change?? do i change it to my private ip?

item.title: Client.jav
item.dc:creator: @PdDub PdDub
item.description:
@PdDub wrote:

uTorrent? Lolololololololoolol. That would make connections even worse. I suggest you go to http://portforward.com/ before portforwarding. You should port forward if you are gonna use no-ip because I dunno if that will help at all, because I am gonna use no-ip. Well, Short and simple: Port Foward First, Hamachi/No-Ip Next.

Read full topic

item.title: Client.jav
item.dc:creator: @PdDub PdDub
item.description:
@PdDub wrote:

The IP Address Should be at the top. And you Do change it to your IP Address. Most people suggest No-IP.org because it is easier to use and you don’t need any programs. Others migth suggest hamachi because it auto changes IP So you dont have to. I’d suggest using 127.0.0.1 till you want it online, When you do want it online, change it to your No-Ip Address/Hamachi Address and upload it then allow people to download it. Good luck

Read full topic
